channel.title: CVE Feed for Digamber Pradhan -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Digamber Pradhan -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-27999|2024-08-02T00:41:55.986Z -- digamber%20pradhan -- preview%20e-mails%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Digamber Pradhan Preview E-mails for WooCommerce allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Preview E-mails for WooCommerce: from n/a through 2.2.1.
